textBox.richText: Inspired by Georg Klein’s PTAM and Daniel Wagner et. al’s paper, I developed a similar template-based tracker for AR during my internship at Nokia. Yun-Ta Tsai, an awesome graphics programmer, has ported and integrated it to his awesome AR framework for N900 phones.  Unfortunately, Nokia Hollywood lab was closed and I guess nobody uses it anymore. However, I can guarantee that the tracker performance was comparable to this awesome tracker, which has been grown up to the famous Qualcomm’s Vuforia framework nowadays.
